GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all usernames

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of a single article requested by article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with an article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts an object in the form of { inc_votes: newVote }, serves an array of the article with  votes property updated

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts and object with username and body properties, serves an array of the posted comment

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id, nothing returned
